title: Reproduction can be asexual or sexual 2

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Reproduction can be either asexual or sexual.
content.question: Identify THREE ways that sexual reproduction increases genetic variability. For each, explain how it increases genetic diversity among the offspring.

frqParts.text: Identify THREE ways that sexual reproduction increases genetic variability. For each, explain how it increases genetic diversity among the offspring.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
